color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

caption.description: Step’s additional information that appears beneath the title
caption.description_zh: 标题下方显示的步骤的附加信息

prefix.description: Step's prefix (max 2 characters) which replaces the icon if step does not has error, is being edited or is marked as done
prefix.description_zh: 步骤的前缀（最多 2 个字符），如果步骤没有错误、正在编辑或标记为已完成，则替换图标

done-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

done-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
done-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

active-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

active-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
active-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

error-icon.desc: Icon name following Quasar convention; If 'none' (String) is used as value, then it will defer to prefix or the regular icon for this state; Make sure you have the icon library installed unless you are using 'img:' prefix

error-color.description: Color name for component from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.desc: Color name for the selection bar (can be 'transparent' too) from the Quasar Color Palette
error-color.description_zh: Quasar Color Palette （类星体调色板） 中组件的颜色名称

error.description: Mark the step as having an error

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content of the step; Can also contain a QStepperNavigation if you want to handle step navigation and don't have a global navigation in place
slots.description_zh: 步骤的内容;如果您想处理步骤导航并且没有全局导航，也可以包含 QStepperNavigation
